column1: Kata Robata////Came here based on Yelp Reviews
column2: so I have to pay it forward.  Very fresh sushi
column3: and on this Friday night the sushi came out with dizzying speed.  Good presentation
column4: crowd seemed youngish and not too casual nor overdressed.  I would absolutely come here again.  In my opinion a very good mix of authentic sushi (a la Nippon) and trendy spot (like Ra).  Might be my new goto sushi spot.
